reprint.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to print a book, story, newspaper article etc again
reprint.translation[1].definitions[0].de: an occasion when more copies of a book are printed because all the copies of it have been sold
reprint.translation[1].definitions[1].de: a book that is printed again
reprint.translation[2].definitions[0].de: if a book, document etc is reprinted, or if it reprints, more copies are printed
reprint.translation[2].definitions[0].ex: the costs of redesigning and reprinting stationery
The publisher is reprinting 20,000 copies with corrections.
